youtube.title: Pricing Psychology for Tattoo Artists (feat. Nikko Hurtado) | TattooNOW Weekly Ep. 4
youtube.description:
Nikko Hurtado reveals the pricing strategies that transformed his career. Plus: a text Q&A with fine-line artist Emily Tran and clips from past episodes.

In this episode:
- Why artists undercharge (and how to stop)
- Tiered pricing models that work
- Handling 'too expensive' objections
- Emily Tran: building a waitlist without video

Guests: Nikko Hurtado (@nikkohurtado), Emily Tran (@emilytran.ink)

#TattooArtist #TattooBusiness #PricingStrategy
